titleStmt.title: The art of cookery refin'd and augmented containing an abstract of some rare and rich unpublished receipts of cookery / collected from the practise of that incomparable master of these arts, Mr. Jos. Cooper, chiefe cook to the late king ; with severall other practises by the author ; with an addition of preserves, conserves, &c., offering an infallible delight to all judicious readers.
titleStmt.author: Cooper, Joseph, chiefe cook to the late king.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for R. Lowndes ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
